EOR Visas

Your fast-track through the immigration maze

Acquiring a work visa where you don’t own an entity can cost up to $200,000 and take months. Our in-house team handles it all—from visa sponsorship to onboarding—and can take care of payroll, tax filing, and more.

sponsored visas

Relocate with one streamlined global process

Whether you need to move employees hired through your own entity to your headquarters or another office, we can support you in 20+ countries while ensuring a seamless visa process. We specialize in managing large volumes and complex cases, helping you save on costs and resources by consolidating your mobility operations.

US Immigration

Expedite the US visa process with our expertise

FAQs

How does visa sponsorship work?

With Deel, EOR visa sponsorship is built into the intuitive global HR platform. Companies using Deel can quickly initiate the visa sponsorship and procurement process while creating a work contract for a new hire, or they can check visa eligibility and understand timeline and costs before creating a contract.

How much does it cost to sponsor a work visa? Are there other costs to consider?

Prices vary between visa types; refer to our immigration support guides to find more information about each visa category.

How does Deel handle work visas?

Expedite the visa processing timeline with Deel’s accelerated visa application support service. Our immigration experts handle visa sponsorship, applications, and compliance in a fraction of the time.

How long does the relocation process usually take?

Processing timelines and end-to-end processes vary between employment visa types; refer to our immigration support guides to find more information about each visa category.
